name: Click Mall
description:
Make Big Bucks!

In Click Mall, your aim is to be the best computer shop in town. Earn money, invest in different shop items, and make big bucks!

Summary

You earn money by clicking anywhere in the game window. Each click grants you a certain amount of money that is determined by your click reward.

You can use the money to buy shop items to generate passive income. Each shop item generates a certain amount of money depending on its income value.

You can upgrade already bought shop items to increase both their click reward and passive income stats to make more bucks.

Be cautious of burglars and technical accidents. If you fail to catch a burglar, you lose money; and, if there is a technical accident in a certain part of the shop, you can't generate passive income from that part.

Controls

Navigate: Left Mouse Button

Move: Right Mouse Button (Hold)

Zoom In/Out: Mouse Wheel

Change Floor: TAB, X
